Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Relates to the definition of population for purposes of providing substantially equal weight for the population of that local government in the allocation of representation in the local legislative body
Summary: Relates to the definition of "population" for purposes of providing substantially equal weight for the population of that local government in the allocation of representation in the local legislative body.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the municipal home rule law, in relation to the definition of "population" for purposes of providing substantially equal weight for the population of that local government in the allocation of representation in the local legislative body
